name: Aptika
overview: Aptika is a North American company specialized in ID card software, hardware and services integrating high-performance security technologies: digital pictures, color codes, barcodes, fingerprints, holograms, electronic signatures and other security options. Aptika helps organizations to enhance their security requirements with Access Control Cards, Membership Cards, Convention Badges, Student ID cards, Employee ID, Loyalty Cards, Event Passes, Library cards, Certification cards and other identification needs. Since 1999, Aptika has been offering a great range of ID card related products and services for event organizers, trade associations and corporations of every type.
